transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello?
Executive: Sir good evening.
Customer: Hanji good evening.
Executive: Amarjeet ji Sarfaraz baat kar raha hun Rahul ka senior manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Sarfaraz bataiye bataiye bataiye.
Executive: Haan main keh raha tha aapne jo TDS submit kiya hai bilkul theek hai ye basic amount ka 2% hai jo mere according bhi 2881 baith raha hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai reconciliation ke liye maine update kar diya hai ye aapka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ye aapke account mein lagbhag one week ke andar pahunchega sir saat se aath working days mein.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Mil jayega aapko ye theek hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ye ho jayega aur dusra ek feedback aapne aur diya tha usme main dekh raha tha kuch isko leke bhi aapne diya hai na sir ki matlab services ko leke kya I am interested to kya bolte hain isme TrustSeal renewal only.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur star ka star ka nahi karne hai to matlab ROI not getting expected ROI ye aapne likha hai.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai to matlab ye aapka matlab isme star mein visibility aapne check kari thi proper sir matlab jaise apni chal rahi hai yahan pe.
Customer: Dekho visibility koi bhi rahi ho koi bhi reason koi kuch bhi raha ho achi rahi ho buri rahi ho mujhe usse koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Visibility ke liye paisa nahi laga raha koi aadmi business dekho leads aa rahi hai leads badh gayi leads aati hai leads kaun si aa rahi hai sale chor aate hain sare customer.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: 50 rupay ki cheez unko 20 rupay mein chahiye wo nahi milegi to main kya kitna business mature kar lunga batao IndiaMART se.
Executive: Matlab main samajh gaya matlab quality ke according matlab wo price nahi de pa rahe hain matlab.
Customer: Nahi mil rahe hain so isliye main degrade karna chah raha hun sorry TrustSeal pe jana chah raha hun.
Executive: Dekho further discussion na hi kare to badhiya hai main.
Customer: Main bana chuka hun ke usi pe rehna hai ab aap aap log discussion karo nahi karo.
Executive: Sir main call discuss kar raha hun Amarjeet ji koi jabardasti nahi hai aap samjho baat ko theek hai mujhe bhi to pata chale ki hamare product mein matlab aur kya improvement ki zarurat hai.
Customer: Improvement ki zarurat yahi hai ki agar genuine customer honge to obviously baat hai market mein unko matlab wo quality se koi matlab nahi hai customer aise hi hai.
Executive: Matlab quality se koi matter nahi hai unhe cheap se cheap matlab price prices matlab saste chahiye hai na quality se koi matter nahi hai.
Customer: Customer bilkul aise hi quality matter nahi karti unko price saste chahiye hote hain.
Executive: To ye Amarjeet sir ye jo matlab ab star ki vajah se aapka jo calls ratio badha tha har inquiry ka theek hai visibility ka to ye aapko jo challenge aaye hain ye aapko calls mein aaye hain ya buylead mein aaye hain ye wale problem.
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Ye matlab jo matlab customer to customer hai ye to hai nahi ki inquiry karke jo customer aayega wo badhiya aayega aur buylead se aayega wo ghatiya aayega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dono mein thoda sa difference ye hai ki ek to aapko direct call karta hai to wo puchta hai ki matlab mujhe aapka product dikhai de raha hai metal mobile stand theek hai ki main Ahmedabad se baat kar raha hun ya Delhi se baat kar raha hun theek hai aur ye mujhe yahan pe live price price jo hai aapka itna dikhai de raha hai.
Customer: Wo wo mujhe akele ko call nahi karega wo wo search karke call kar raha hai wo 10 ko call karega.
Executive: Haan usne aur ko bhi kiya hoga baat sahi hai aapki.
Customer: Haan matlab kabhi ho sakta hai ki un 10 mein matlab apna number bhi ho aur prices dusra ache lage ho reasonable jo jo yahan pe dikh rahe ho kyunki aapke jo prices hai wo 75 rupees hai yahan pe is product ke.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Aluminium steel mobile wala jo hai apna aur aap hi ki tarah ek age enterprise hai unke bhi 70 rupees hai ek client ka 100 rupees hai to mujhe nahi lag raha ki aapke price itne zyada hai theek hai matlab approx approx aapki tarah auron ke bhi same prices hi update hai lagbhag lagbhag yahan pe.
Executive: To is wale isme matlab jo direct call kar raha hai shayad wo matlab prices mein itna wo na karta ho kyunki wo khud se call kar raha hai aapko main ye kehna chah raha tha sir aapse.
Customer: Chalo aap kya chahte ho mujhe ye batao.
Executive: Main main ye chah raha hun ke sir buylead wala to ek baar ko aapko bahar ye bol raha hoga ke kyunki uske paas aap dekho wo to theek hai buylead wale bhi bolte hain inquiry wale bhi bolte hain call wale bhi bolte hain aise hi bolte hain.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Abhi wo 75 aur 70 mein farak hai na 5 rupay ka.
Executive: Haan hai na 5 rupay ka farak to hai hi.
Customer: Agar agar agar hum uski 70 70 ko meet karane ke liye chalenge to ho sakta hai 70 wala usko 65 mein offer karke baitha ho.
Executive: Hmm ye bhi ho sakta hai na.
Executive: Ji ji baat sahi hai aapki kyunki aapse zyada bhi hai aapse kam bhi hai baat aapki theek hai.
Executive: To isme kul milake ye hai ki aapki jo expectation thi uske according nahi mil raha isliye aap.
Customer: Mere ko to mere khyal se jo maine kharcha kiya wo bhi pura nahi hua hoga mera.
Executive: Acha aapne nikal to liya hi hoga approximate idea ki kya calculation hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir main dekho agar main agar main maine aapko I think 1.5 lakh diya tha is service ka mujhe zyada idea hai.
Executive: Kitna kitna?
Customer: 1.5 ke aas pass diya tha na.
Executive: Nahi aapne jo diya hai iska 1 60 60 20 ek 20 diya hai aapne iska star ka.
Customer: Haan chalo ek 20 diya hoga baki including catalog vagaira vagaira bhi to hoti hai na.
Executive: Haan catalog ka separate hai sir bilkul sahi baat hai aapki wo bhi hai aapka.
Customer: Theek hai wo wo sab cheeze hai to mere hisab mujhe jahan tak yaad hai 1.5 se zyada kharcha tha.
Executive: Aapka uske uske uske wo kharcha karne ke baad main expect kar kar sakta hun ki mujhe 15 lakh to kamane chahiye the.
Executive: 15 lakh kamane chahiye the.
Customer: At least itne to kamane chahiye the.
Customer: Aur maine aur maine apna kharcha hi nikala 1.5 lakh hi kama kamaya ho to maine kya kamaya maine to aap logon ke liye kamaya bas.
Executive: Aap 15 lakh ka margin ki baat kar rahe hain ya sale ki baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Margin ki baat kar raha hun bhaiya.
Executive: Sir 15 lakh ye to kafi matlab margin percentage ho gaya fir apna yahan pe uske liye to kafi sale lagti hogi.
Customer: Iske liye honi chahiye at least 70 75 lakh ki sale to lagni chahiye.
Executive: Wahi wahi wahi main keh raha hun sir 70 75 lakh ki sale.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Samajh gaya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Waise approx kitni sale hogi hogi sir ispe matlab abhi ek saal haan ek saal se ek saal mein matlab IndiaMART pe kaam karke haan haan haan IndiaMART pe kaam karke hui hogi 6 7 lakh rupay ki.
Executive: 6 7 lakh rupay ki.
Customer: Haan 6 7 lakh rupay mein laga lo idea maine kya kama liya hoga.
Executive: Wo sir waise main sab puchna nahi chahunga aapko pata hi hai sir kitne percent margin aapne 20% bhi maan lo maine margin rakha hua to kitna 1.5 lakh ho gaya aapki seva main wahi to bata raha hun aap logon ki seva kar raha hun main to aapke liye kama raha hun iska matlab.
Executive: Sir ab ye hai ki humne kafi cheeze isme matlab sudhar kari hai quality of the leads bhi kari hai aapki quality se aapki quality se sudhar ka kuch nahi hoga wo to customer ka mindset hai na wo nahi change kar sakte.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Par sir ye hai na 250 crore ki jansankhya hai isme se 250 mein se to 150 crore ka to mindset wahi hai baki 25 crore ko kahan se dhundhe.
Executive: Baat aapki theek hai magar ye hai ki sir dekho convince to karna padta hi hai buyer ko aur quality quality to matter karti hai magar buyer ki humesha koi hai dekho jeans mein cheeze hai sir har koi ye chahta hai ki matlab hume cheap prices mein mil jaye negotiate karta hi hai har koi theek hai fir bhi ye hai ki ek saal aapne experience kara hai mere hisab se to aapko abhi matlab itni jaldi decision nahi lena chahiye sir kyunki ye AI based product hai sir ye wala jo hai apna jo aapko diya gaya hai dynamic usse change hota hai to aane wale time mein yahi hai ki sir yahi hai sir ke milke kaam karenge kuch aur acha koshish karte hain ki sir aapko maza nahi aaya de do isi isi amount mein ek saal ki service free de do agle saal maza aayega to fir continue rakh lenge payment karke.
Executive: Dekho sir main aapko aapka concern discuss kar raha hun sir main ab main main to koi wo nahi hun ki sir aapko bol do ki sir free ho jayega ya kara dunga malik aapka.
Customer: Wahi to main mana kar raha hun ke aapke hath mein to hai nahi aur meri expectation ke according hua nahi to ji ji ji.
Executive: Dekhta hun sir isme aur kya matlab kuch decision mera solid hai main dekhta hun Amarjeet ji kuch discount vagaira ya kuch aur acha ho paya aapke liye to renewal ke regarding discount nahi hai discount karana hai to wo usme TrustSeal mein hi karana.
Customer: Acha.
Executive: Koi nahi main discount bhi karana ho na to TrustSeal mein karwana upar nahi ja raha hun main.
Executive: Abhi to bilkul solid decision hai abhi to abhi to time hai do mahine ka.
Customer: Haan aur ek cheez main keh raha tha sir ek product hai aapka medicine rack ye aapki website mein add nahi hai par aapne panch buylead consume kari hai pichle che mahine mein to kya isko add kar dun medicine rack.
Customer: Keyword ki baat keyword ki baat hai wo actually to pharmacy rack hai aur usme pharmacy mein kahi medicine rack kahi medical store rack ab har keyword ke according fir product add karna padega.
Executive: Wo kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai kabhi koi search kar le sir main isliye keh raha tha request hai agar aap bologe to sir ji main add kar dunga.
Customer: Add kar do add koi dikkat nahi hai koi charge nahi lenge.
Executive: Theek hai maine ye add kar diya hai aapki isme image jo hai sir iska aap apni side se lagaenge ya mujhe main nahi main dal dunga.
Executive: Haan aap dal dijiyega aur TDS ka jo hai jaise maine bataya sir raise kar diya hai maine yahan se theek hai within week saat se aath working days mein wo 100% aapko mil jayega aapne jo certificate diya wo bilkul sahi hai maine check kara liya hai request maine dal di hai par office time 6 baje ka hai na to uski vajah se matlab request jo hai jo bhi kaam hoga ispe kal hoga fir Saturday Sunday aa gaya par aapka saat aadin mein hi aapke account mein pahunch jayega.
Customer: Haan koi baat nahi 10 din mein bhi aayega to bhi koi dikkat nahi hai baat hamari team mein request dali hai fir kaam hona chahiye bas.
Executive: Nahi nahi 100% hoga sir maine recording mein baat kar raha hun aapse aur ek chota sa request hai sir main aapki mere paas jo hai mail aaya tha ke TDS ke regarding customer care@indiamart.com pe aapne mail kiya tha.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai to maine aapko information de di hai ke TDS amount jo hai aapka jo ban raha tha 2881 jo ki aapne bhi wahi share kara hai mujhe bilkul match kar gaya theek hai wo aapke account mein pahunchega to ab main is feedback ko jo hai sir close kar raha hun aapki registered mail ID pe ek feedback aayega ki aapka discussion hua hai kya hai na to aap us feedback ko jo hai positive share kar dijiyega sir apni side se.
Customer: Sure sure kar dunga.
Executive: Thank you sir okay sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to degrade to TrustSeal only.

- Dissatisfied with lead quality and ROI.

- Feels the cost is not justified.

- Expects a 15 lakh margin but earned less.


Resolution:

- Executive explained the call inquiry process.

- Executive added medicine rack to the website.

- Executive confirmed TDS refund request is processed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check for discounts on TrustSeal.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, refund, subscription, roi
